short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pull data from Google Search Results Page for Marketing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Congratulations! You are one step closer to your dreams.

With the Smart SERP Data Collector, you can automate your data pulling tasks and curate lists to help you find what you're looking for easily.

This will become the most valuable tool in your marketing kit. 

Work smarter - not harder. With options and settings to setup your collection the way you want it, you never have to worry about scraping erroneous data or wasting usage credits.

Use case examples:
1) Selling Lawnmowers
Let's say you're in the business of selling wholesale lawnmowers. Your clients are probably landscape companies. Instead of paying for outdated and unverified lists of contact information, you can run Smart SERP and target landscapers in your area. Next, you could do manual outreach or simply feed the spreadsheet to the next part of your automated process.

2) Shopping for a specific Audi
Maybe you're a car enthusiast and you're looking for a specific new model that hasn't been published on the popular car sites yet. You're looking for an allocation. Rather than manually pulling the data for Audi dealerships, you can use the Smart SERP to collect contact data for you. Next, you could do manual outreach or simply feed the spreadsheet to the next part of your automated process.

3) B2B Marketing
Perhaps you sell marketing and you want to reach out to specific customers about your amazing product. Simple search for the niche and let Smart SERP collect the data for you. Next, you could do manual outreach or simply feed the spreadsheet to the next part of your automated process.

Interested in a free trial? Please contact us and we will be happy to provide you with a free trial.
